drinkList.Name: Margarita
drinkList.Recipe: Rim chilled glass with salt (Optional) Combine ice and equal parts of all ingredients into a cocktail shaker Shake and serve into glass

drinkList.Name: Gin and Tonic
drinkList.Recipe: Mix 2 parts tonic water with 1 part gin in cup over ice Add lime juice to taste and serve with lime garnish

drinkList.Name: Old Fashioned
drinkList.Recipe: Combine 2 parts whiskey or bourbon with 1 part simple Syrup over ice add a few dashes of bitters to taste Garnish with orange slice and a cherry

drinkList.Name: Martini
drinkList.Recipe: Mix 1 part vermouth with 6 parts gin in a chilled glass Optionally, add olive brine or a twist of lemon

drinkList.Name: Moscow Mule
drinkList.Recipe: Mix 1 part vodka with 2 parts ginger beer over ice in a chilled copper cup Add lime juice to taste

drinkList.Name: Amaretto Sour
drinkList.Recipe: Combine 3 parts amaretto, 1 Part whiskey, 1 part simple syrup over ice in a cocktail shaker Shake, strain and serve in glass Add lemon juice to taste

drinkList.Name: Pina Colada
drinkList.Recipe: Blend equal parts malibu and white rum, coconut milk, pineapple, and ice Serve in chilled glass with pineapple or lime garnish

drinkList.Name: Mojito
drinkList.Recipe: Muddle lime juice, simple syrup, and mint in glass Add 2 parts rum and 3 parts soda water Stir and Enjoy

drinkList.Name: Whiskey Sour
drinkList.Recipe: Combine 2 part lemon juice, 1 part simple syrup, and 1 part whiskey in glass over ice Stir, Garnish with a cherry

drinkList.Name: Daiquriri
drinkList.Recipe: Combine 2 parts rum, 1 part lime juice, 1 part syrup in shaker with ice Shake and strain into chilled glass garnish with lime

drinkList.Name: Long Island
drinkList.Recipe: Combine equal parts of all liquors in glass with ice add spash of coca cola and sweet and sour mix Stir and enjoy

drinkList.Name: Negroni
drinkList.Recipe: Combine equal parts of all ingreients in glass over ice

drinkList.Name: Dark and Stormy
drinkList.Recipe: Combine 2 parts rum, 2 parts ginger beer, and 1 part lime to shaker with ice Shake and strain in to glass Garnish with lime

drinkList.Name: Screw Driver
drinkList.Recipe: Combine ingreients to taste and stir
